hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd $JENKINS_HOME #this environment variable point to `/var/lib/jenkins` git init git add . git add --all git config --global user.email "dumdumgw@gmail.com" git config --global user.name "edwin-noh" BACKUP_TIMESTAMP=`date +%s` #current timestamp if ! git remote | grep origin > /dev/null; then #if remote origin is NOT set, add it git remote add origin https://github.com/edwin-noh/kb-jenkins-backup-demo.git fi git commit -m "Automated Jenkins backup - $BACKUP_TIMESTAMP" git push https://edwin-noh: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@github.com/bbalakriz/jenkins-backup.git --all
